name: Super Blocket Hell
description:
* Update: We made a build with instructions and fixed an XBox 360 controller drift issue a few hours after the deadline.  We're leaving the web build as is so that the deadline version is featured.

Blocks are raining down upon you; survive as long as you can!

As your Vanquish Bar fills, you can eliminate blocks one at a time, or wait until its filled to unleash your true power. Don't get squished! Use your Rewind power at the right time to avoid certain death.

Super Blocket Hell includes local multiplayer! Play together on the same keyboard or with a controller. Social Distancing? No problem; Super Blocket Hell is compatible with Parsec* so you can turn your local versus match into an online one.

-Controls-

Controller Recommended

Single Player:
Move = A/D (Keyboard), Left/Right (Gamepad)
Jump = Spacebar (Keyboard), A Button (Gamepad)
Vanquish Blocks = Z (Keyboard), B button (Gamepad)
Rewind (if glowing!) = C (Keyboard), X Button (Gamepad)

Versus Mode:
Keyboard:
Player 1: Move = A/D, Jump = W, Vanquish = S, Rewind = Left Shift
Player 2: Move = Left/Right, Jump = Up, Vanquish = Down, Rewind = Right Shift
Gamepad:
Move = Left/Right, Jump = A Button, Vanquish = B Button, Rewind = X Button

Super Blocket Hell was developed for both Brackeys Jam 2020.2 and LOWREZJAM 2020. With the extended development time allowed by LOWREZJAM, we were able to add multiplayer functionality to turn our fun arcade game into a chaotic party game. You can play the Brackeys Jam version here: https://aggressive-combustion.itch.io/blocket-hell

Developed by Aggressive Combustion and Second Shot Games. Music: "Beatles Unite" by Rachel K Collier. Find us on Twitter: @AC_GameStudios and @Colegamedesign.

*Individual experience with Parsec may vary, Gamepad controls suggested
